column3: Latest;Phnom Penh-------  On the evening of October 18
column5: a foreign man was arrested by police following a court order. The arrest was made near the National Assembly  in Tonle Bassac commune
column10: was riding a three-wheeler tuk tuk in a southbound direction
column12: license plate number 2AC-7772 stopped the tuk tuk and removed the man.------The foreigner shouted for help
column13: but the public were told that officers were executing an arrest warrant. Authorities have not yet confirmed the case. ------AREY NEWS
